articles.title: Italy's 'Ndrangheta targeted in police raids across Europe - BBC
articles.description: Dozens were detained across Europe in what police say is the biggest operation against the 'Ndrangheta.
articles.content:
Police across Europe have arrested more than 100 people in a crackdown on Italy's most powerful mafia group.
They said it was the biggest operation to have ever been carried out against the 'Ndrangh… [+3143 chars]
